content.html: Whenever I give a talk about my experience of being stalked, during Q&A there's always at least one parent that asks "How can I make sure that this doesn't happen to my daughter?" I have NEVER been asked "How can I make sure my son never does this to someone?"
content.value:
Whenever I give a talk about my experience of being stalked, during Q&A there's always at least one parent that asks "How can I make sure that this doesn't happen to my daughter?" 

I have NEVER been asked "How can I make sure my son never does this to someone?"
